about_the_game:
Gather around, Gather around! The Crusty Carnival is in town! Bringing with it lots of food and fun and the Crazy Gulls are here to indulge to their hearts content! Round up your friends for a 4-player local multiplayer brawl to see who among will receive the honor of Top Gull!

Style your Gull

These gulls are not only crazy, but they also possess a keen eye for fashion! Enter the pre-fight lobby and Style your gull with different Skins and Hats, with Skin options ranging from a dapper tuxedo to a vibrant rainbow plumage, and a variety of Hats including a bottle cap, cowboy hat, and a golden crown there are countless ways to customize your gull!

Feeding Frenzy

Crazy Gulls love to eat! Eating food and increasing their Calorie Count is the greatest measure of success for these gulls, and those who attain the highest Calorie count will be crowned Top Gull.

Players will fight over the most Delicious and Calorie rich food item is the Golden Crust, and make use of other food items to help them in their clash, make use of special items such as burning your opponents with a spicy chill pepper or regurgitating a powerful rolling donut can help you stun gulls and clear a path to the Golden Crust.

These Gulls got moves!

Why use your power ups when you can just eat them up! Players can choose to swallow their food items to give them a boost in calories and fill their Shot Meter, when full your Gull can shoot out their “Shot” to create a puddle that slows and damages, in addition to the Shot, Players can also use Seagull Spin for AOE damage and Seagull Smash to dash their way to the Golden Crust stunning any Gull in their path.

Multiple Maps

Take your clash to one of three specialized maps, all of which include randomized obstacle placements, each with their own twist! The Crusty Carnival including a roller coaster with drop the Screw Shield powerup, The Beachside Boardwalk with a rising tide concentrates the battle to a small area, and Pirate Peak with crashing waves that sway the boat back and forth.

Auspicious Awards

Need extra Calories to secure your victory? Or perhaps your performance wasn’t up to snuff and you’re looking for a comeback! The awards ceremony has you covered, at the end of the game players will be granted up to 3 awards depending on how they played, from Manure Marksman to the Pity Party, these awards all award Calories which can turn the tides of victory!

name: Clash for Crust

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-1135G7/AMD Ryzen 5500U or Above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Xe, AMD Radeon 448SP, Nvidia MX350
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-8100/AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or Above
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Arc 3, AMD Radeon RX6600, Nvidia GTX 1050
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Clash for Crust is a 2-4 Player local multiplayer party brawler. Customize and take control of a Crazy Gull and fight using your Seagull Attacks and Power-Ups to grab the Golden Crust and to battle for the honor of becoming Top Gull.
